subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Phillies expect closer Brad Lidge to miss three to six weeks while recovering from a strained right shoulder, but General Manager Ruben Amaro Jr. said Lidge would not need surgery.
snippet: The Philadelphia Phillies expect closer Brad Lidge to miss three to six weeks while recovering from a strained right shoulder, but General Manager Ruben Amaro Jr. said Lidge would not need surgery.
